services.name: Infant Care
services.description: Our infant program provides nurturing care in a safe and stimulating environment. Our experienced caregivers focus on supporting your baby's natural development while providing the attention, care, and play experiences they need.

services.name: Toddler Program
services.description: Our toddler program is designed for active, curious young children. We focus on language development, social skills, and providing plenty of opportunities for safe exploration and learning through play.

services.name: Preschool
services.description: Our preschool program prepares children for kindergarten through a balance of play and structured learning activities. We focus on key developmental areas including cognitive, social, emotional, and physical growth.

services.name: After School Care
services.description: Our after-school program offers a safe and enriching environment for school-age children. We provide homework support, engaging activities, and opportunities for relaxation and play after a full day of school.

services.name: Summer Program
services.description: Our summer program offers exciting and educational activities to keep children engaged during school breaks. Each week features different themes with field trips, special guests, and hands-on projects.
